name: Broken Reflections: A 3D Interactive Story
description:
“Broken Reflections” is a 3D interactive story created for my senior capstone project. It is a third-person perspective experience about self-acceptance and self-reflection. This story follows a man named James who had many struggles throughout his life. The overwhelming structure of everyday life had taken a toll on his mental health, and for a long time, he was not seeking help on bettering himself as a person. However, James is involved in an accident and he is left in a visually fragmented state. The player must help James by traveling through his past and recollecting his memories.  Along his journey, he rediscovers himself and transforms into a whole new person.

This is the finished product of my senior year project at the end of the semester.Now that I am graduated, I plan on working on it more.
